Tracker Hatuba:
In the Forest of the Dead were killed not only the rebels von Hellman, but he is with family. Don't know how this could happen with such a respected native... unfortunately, the dead cannot speak.
After the death of von Gelmanov here strange things began to happen. It was rumored that they had a plot, was lured into the woods and killed.
Anyway, I think the answers can be found in the Woods Dead. So we hope that You will help me to get to the truth.
